page.title: 11Farming in Parbold-Hilldale
page.content: LIVESTOCK In the Parbold area there are lots of cows:Friesian,Ayrshire and Parbold Hall Holsteins.There are hens cockerels, ducks,geese,sheep,goats,ponies and horses.In one narrow lane a herd of cows came down to be milked and held up the traffic.At Bispham Green a calf and cow were in a barn.In Parbold some people known as pigeon fanciers keep racing pigeons.Dr.Rigg owns a barn with the pigeons loft by the drive at Fairhurst Hall.At Harrock Hall there are 80 milking cows,90 followers and 5 bulls of the Parbold Holstein breed.
